name: Viramo Consulting
goal: “Viramo Consulting” Ltd. is specialized in EU/national policy consulting, lobbying stakeholders, strategy and management. Its goal is to keep the clients informed about and be active on major policy developments in the sector, related to their business and covering actions of European and national policy making bodies and other stakeholders.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: EU Consumer Law; Taxation; Digital Single Market; Tourism; Entrepreneurship and innovation; Competition; Collaborative Economy
